data.title: Joyalukkas Jewellery honored with ‘Business Excellence’ award in UK
meta_keywords: Joyalukkas Jewellery honored with ‘Business Excellence’ award in UK
data.meta_description: Joyalukkas Jewellery honored with ‘Business Excellence’ award in UK
data.text:
DUBAI — The eponymous Joyalukkas Jewellery received the Business Excellence Award for Established Business in UK from the UK-Kerala Business Forum at the UK Parliament, Westminster, London on Sept. 14, 2016.

“I embarked on my entrepreneurial journey in the UAE with a simple goal: to be the best and world’s favorite jeweler. I sincerely thank UK Kerala Business Forum for bestowing us with this honor and motivating us to keep at our path of excellence. I also thank our customers and my committed team of employees for their patronage and support in helping us make this happen,” said Joy Alukkas, Chairman & MD, Joyalukkas Group

Jojan Thomas & Mathews Antony received the award from Cllr Carol Davie Mayor of Loughton, Virendra Sharma Member of Parliament for Ealing, Southall in the presence of Philip Abraham, Deputy Mayor of Loughton; A S Rajan, Minister Coordination, High Commission of India.

‘Joyalukkas’ is a brand that has constantly strived on innovation to ensure they offer a delightful shopping experience to customers at all time. Under the vision and business acumen of its founder, Joy Alukkas, the jeweler has launched various initiatives at their many jewelry outlets to enhance the shopping experience of customers, like the intensive training programs for staff and a unique loyalty program for customers. Joyalukkas has been the first jewelry chain to initiate such programs to ensure they offer customers the best at all times. The brand has also retained its Super brand status in the UAE for the past 7 years in a row.

Some of the other prestigious awards received by Joy Alukkas, include an award presented by Sheikh Mohammed Bin Rashid Al Maktoum, Vice President & Prime Minister of UAE and Ruler of Dubai, under the Dubai Quality Awards program for creating and maintaining international standards across all business operations & departments. Sheikha Lubna Bint Khalid Al Qasimi has also presented to them, on behalf of Retail ME, the ‘Best Retailer of the Year’ Middle East.

Joy Alukkas is no stranger to accolades in his 29 years at the helm of one of the world’s most successful business empire. And it is no wonder his vision and passion for excellence has driven his entrepreneurial journey from a single jewelry showroom in Abu Dhabi to a multi-billion empire spanning jewelry, retail, fashion, money exchange, realty and aviation industries in 11 countries. In such a brief span of time, the Joyalukkas brand has become a household name. The Group enjoys the loyal patronage of over 10 million customers in the UAE, India, UK, Singapore, Malaysia, Qatar, Oman, Bahrain, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia and the USA. — SG
